title: Hokuto No Ken - Ryuken Gaiden
alternative_title: (北斗の拳 リュウケン外伝) －THE JUDGEMENT DAY－ ; Hokuto no Ken Ryūken Gaiden THE JUDGEMENT DAY ; Ryuken’s Story: The Judgement Day
status: (北斗の拳 リュウケン外伝) －THE JUDGEMENT DAY－ ; Hokuto no Ken Ryūken Gaiden THE JUDGEMENT DAY ; Ryuken’s Story: The Judgement Day
description:
Description :
        A oneshot story about Kenshiro's sifu Ryuken and also the other adoptive brothers. Elaborates on how he chose the Hokuto Shinken successor and the events related to it.
